description: This header file defines the Notification class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which is a subclass of WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message. It provides declarations for a constructor, destructor, and methods toString() and isValid(). It appears to be part of a WebSockets JSON-RPC implementation related to notifications.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC notification message in the WebSockets namespace, derived from WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Converts the notification message to its string representation.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks whether the notification message is valid.
